name: NeXus: One Core
description: Use fusion. Avoid obstacles. Die. Try again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1 / Windows® 8.1 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Memory: 2 GB MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX260 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX 9.0c or higher) Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard +Mouse.Xbox 360 PC compatible controller or comparable XInput-based gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1 / Windows® 8.1 Processor: Core i5-655K 3.2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560, ATI DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX 9.0c or higher) Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard +Mouse.Xbox 360 PC compatible controller or comparable XInput-based gamepad recommended.

reviews.review_text: Fast-paced neon arcade game which is extremely addictive, has very fluent and simple yet unique gameplay and you can choose your 2 favorite colors (in my case it is yellow and lightblue). Soundtrack is absolute fitting and awesome. Sad part is that it is not getting the attention it deserves. Absolutely recommended.
